entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries beginning early this morning then changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
